code: import React from"react";import{Tooltip}from"react-bootstrap";import{OverlayTrigger}from"react-bootstrap";import{faGithub}from"@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons";import{faLinkedin}from"@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TipOverlay(){var sites=[{name:"Github",url:"https://github.com/maalie04",iconClass:"bi bi-github"},{name:"LinkedIn",url:"https://www.linkedin.com/",iconClass:"bi bi-linkedin"}];var renderIcon=function renderIcon(sites){if(sites.name==="Github"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faLinkedin});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex flex-row",children:sites.map(function(site){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"ms-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OverlayTrigger,{placement:"top",overlay:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{id:"tooltip-".concat(site.name),children:site.name}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"footer-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"text-muted",target:"blank",href:site.url,children:renderIcon(site)})})},site.name)});})});}
